property.label: Related List Label
property.name: label
property.description: The name that will appear at the top of the list.

property.label: Related Object API Name
property.name: relatedObject
property.description: The API name of the object you want to display.

property.label: Related Field
property.name: relatedField
property.description: API name of the field that this object is set.

property.label: Field Set
property.name: fieldSet
property.description: Api name of the field set to use.

property.label: WHERE clause
property.name: where_clause
property.description: WHERE clause for query, do not include related field

property.label: Sort By
property.name: sortedBy
property.description: Default field to sort by, make sure field is included in field set.
